title: cc菜单加lore
author: 叉烧
txt_content: 我想在cc菜单里用optifine的材质包，我已经配置好了，那么怎么让cc菜单的物品有lore或者改名呢？像ute那样

replies.author: TCmc
replies.txt_content:
dy:
  NAME: "&e炽热地狱"
  LORE:
    - '======================'
    - "&7地狱世界"
    - "&7点击传送炽热地狱"
    - '======================'
  ID: 87
  COMMAND: "op:mvtp dy"
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 5
这种格式
LORE：
 -'内容'

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
LORE:
  - '内容'

可参照这个教程 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-833109-1-1.html

replies.author: MCLink
replies.txt_content:
与物品一样
在配置文件内输入
  LORE:
  - '内容'
即可
求最佳
